sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: REMISSION in phyſtcs, the abatement of the power or efficacy of any quality ; in oppoſttion to the increaſe of the ſame, which is called intenjion.

p.hi: Remission, in law, &c. denotes the pardon of a crime, or the giving up the puniſhment due thereto.
Remission, in medicine, is when a diſtemper abates for a time, but does not go quite off.
